contest-event.event-date:
May 13, 2017 D British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Reflections on Swan Lake Winter Gardens (Opera House Theatre), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK Best Instrumentalist: Andy MacDonald (cornet), Wingates. Top 2 promoted to British Open for Sep 2017, bottom 4 relegated to Senior Cup for 2018. May 15, 2016, 10:40 a.m. May 14, 2017, 7:20 a.m. 1 Whitburn Band Nicholas Childs 2 Wingates Band Paul Andrews 3 Reg Vardy Band Russell Gray 4 NASUWT Riverside David Roberts 5 The GUS Band Adam Cooke 6 Woodfalls Band Robert Childs 7 Hepworth (Cookson Homes) Leigh Baker 8 Camborne Town Band Kevin MacKenzie 9 Aldbourne Band David Johnson 10 Ashton Band Philip Chalk 11 Thoresby Colliery Ian McElligott 12 Hammonds Saltaire Morgan Griffiths 13 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band Ben Dixon 14 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Michael Fowles 15 Rainford Band Gareth Brindle 16 Kirkintilloch Band Bryan Allen 17 Llwydcoed Band Chris Turner 18 Unite the Union (City of Sheffield) John Roberts 19 Northop Band Paul Hughes 20 Burry Port Town Matthew Rowe
